alert.note: Alert for Northern Black Hills (South Dakota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS RapidCity (Western South Dakota and Northeastern Wyoming)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued May 31 at 12:21PM MDT by NWS RapidCity
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southeastern Lawrence County through 100 PM MDT... At 1220 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Roubaix Lake, or 13 miles southeast of Lead, moving northeast at 10 mph. HAZARD...Penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Nemo and Roubaix Lake. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN MAX WIND GUST...<30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building. This storm may intensify, so be certain to monitor local radio stations and available television stations for additional information and possible warnings from the National Weather Service.
